name: Generative AI Mastery
title: Unlock the power of Generative AI with real-world projects, hands-on labs, and prompt engineering techniques.

name: Python for Data Analysis
title: Master Python, NumPy, Pandas, and Matplotlib to clean, analyze, and visualize real-world datasets.

name: Frontend Development Bootcamp
title: Learn HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and responsive design to build beautiful, interactive websites from scratch.

name: Backend with Node & Express
title: Build scalable backend applications using Node.js, Express, MongoDB, and RESTful APIs.

name: Complete DevOps Guide
title: Become a DevOps Engineer: Docker, Kubernetes, Jenkins, CI/CD pipelines, and AWS deployment.

name: Machine Learning A-Z
title: From linear regression to deep learning, master machine learning using Python and real-world datasets.

name: Cybersecurity Fundamentals
title: Understand key cybersecurity concepts, ethical hacking, encryption, firewalls, and threat analysis.

name: Cloud Computing with AWS
title: Learn AWS EC2, S3, RDS, IAM, and deploy full-stack applications using cloud infrastructure.

name: UI/UX Design Essentials
title: Learn design principles, wireframing, prototyping, and Figma to design user-friendly interfaces.

name: Android App Development
title: Build Android apps using Java and Kotlin with hands-on projects and modern UI design practices.

name: Data Structures & Algorithms
title: Ace coding interviews with mastery over DSA topics like arrays, trees, graphs, and dynamic programming.

name: Blockchain for Beginners
title: Understand the core concepts of blockchain, smart contracts, Ethereum, and decentralized apps.

name: Introduction to AI
title: Discover the fundamentals of Artificial Intelligence and explore how machines think and learn.

name: Python Basics
title: Start your coding journey by learning Python syntax, variables, loops, and functions.

name: Getting Started with Machine Learning
title: A beginner-friendly course to introduce you to machine learning and basic model building.

name: Web Development Fundamentals
title: Learn the core concepts of building websites using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

name: Prompt Engineering Basics
title: Understand how to craft effective prompts to leverage the full power of Generative AI tools.

name: Data Science Overview
title: An overview of Data Science workflows, tools, and real-world use cases to get you started.
